title: List of Stone Soup versions
data:
{{version031}}
This is a list of [[Dungeon Crawl|Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup]] versions. Major versions such as 0.25 introduce new content and balance work, while minor versions such as 0.25.1 typically contain bugfixes.

==Trunk==
[[Trunk]] is the version of Crawl currently in development.  It can be played as a "sneak peek" of features likely to make it into the next release, and can contain balance work or bugfixes not yet in a stable release.

== External links ==
* https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/master/crawl-ref/docs/changelog.txt - Full changelog
